reviewText: way better than I thought it would be
Very touching anime. Prepare to feel the feels.

At first I was just going to buy both seasons separately when I saw that they had both seasons in one. I was a bit skeptical since no one had written a review of it so I didn't know if I should buy it. Eventually,  I decided "what the heck" and bout it, and boy I'm glad I did! The package arrived on time, both seasons were there and they look so good! I always loved these two series so I'm really glad I decided to take the chance and buy it ^-^
